metadata.synopsis: The boat that leads to the Morphic Pool sits gently in the Lower City Underground. The player (and Emperor) have no idea that the Netherbrain is located nearby, so this boat has no purpose yet.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Teleport to the boatclick on it

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Abandoned by the looks of it. Perhaps it had a leak.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Nice boat - I wonder what it's doing here?
